alert.note: Alert for Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1020 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible over the area. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rosebud, Darlington, Oak Hill, Allenton, Neenah, Estelle, McBrydes, Shawnee and Fatama.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
